p: The approximate lattice parameters and atomic coordinates of the η″ phase with the space group C2 /m (i.e. the motif structure without modulation) are derived based on those of the parent η phase [ 15] (left part of Table 1), and tabulated in the right part of Table 1. Each of the Fe, Al1, Al2, and Al3 sites in the η phase with the space group Cmcm splits into a few different Wyckoff sites in the η″ phase with the space group C2 /m.
